summary: Adds spells based on oblivionated1's mod, Breast Size Scalings for NPCs found here: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62472/? to affect the PC.
descriptionHtml:
UPDATE: Everything minus the dress spell should be working now. The spells are added via tomes.Â 

This is a rework of oblivionated1's mod, Breast Size Scalings for NPCs found here: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62472/?

It adds the same spells as the original mod, but instead of working only on NPCs, it only works on the (female) PC.The spells should be automatically added once you reach level 2 (if you are above level 2, they should be automatically added upon load).


NOTE: Requires CBBE, armor that uses CBBE for effects to appear on character while clothed and SKSE.
author: themontyfreak
